name: Flask Recipes

pages.text: There are two tiers of water flasks.$(br)The leather flask holds 5 drinks and lasts for 100 uses.$(br)The iron flask holds 20 drinks, and lasts for 400 uses.$(br2)Both flasks may be repaired.

pages.title: Renew Recipes
pages.text: Flasks can also be repaired when completely broken.
